name: Arc Rise Fantasia
description:
Arc Rise Fantasia is a new turn-based RPG with a beautiful,
anime-inspired Japanese art style. Players will jump into the shoes of
L’Arc, a calm and composed mercenary, who sets out to defend the
Meridian Empire from an impending invasion of ferocious creatures. After
assembling a party of friends, each with a unique set of abilities,
players will embark on a perilous journey across an overworld filled
with deadly enemies and treacherous dungeons. While strategically
queuing up attacks, players can summon mystical creatures and work with
their party members to execute massive attacks. Arc Rise Fantasia
features deep gameplay, top-notch production values, and an
unforgettable story line for Wii - those who have been pining for a
massive fantasy epic will definitely have their patience rewarded.

Features

• From the developers who created the highly lauded Luminous Arc, comes
their next epic role-playing game exclusively for Wii.

• Combines high quality 3D graphics and modern gameplay Classic Japanese
high fantasy role-playing action involving airships, dragons, and a huge
cast of characters.

• Music by legendary composer Yasunori Mutsuda (Chrono Trigger, Tobal
No.1, Xenogears, and more)

• Over 30 hours of gameplay

• Trinity Battle System – Combine the skills of your party to unleash
massive offensive strikes against your foes.

• Strategic Turn Based action – Fight as a team to survive

• Rogress System – Call upon the power of the Gods to annihilate your
enemies.

• Expansive over world to explore with many Secrets, Locations, and Side
Quests to discover.

• A vast array of customizable weapons, magic spells, and special moves
unique to each character.
